tests.title: .clear() - clears an input or textarea element
tests.fullTitle: Actions .clear() - clears an input or textarea element
tests.code:
// https://on.cypress.io/clear
cy.get('.action-clear').type('Clear this text').should('have.value', 'Clear this text').clear().should('have.value', '');
